definition: step with the left foot (Kangxi radical 60)/see also 彳亍[chi4 chu4]
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I'm not in a position to help you financially.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我没办法在财务上帮你忙。

sentences.english: You know, Uncle Brendan, I am really glad you invited me here.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，布莱登叔叔，我真的很高兴你邀请我们来。

sentences.english: His talking is full of speculative thinking, it sounds quite logical.
sentences.chinese: 讲话的思辨性极强，听起来很有逻辑。

sentences.english: J: You have a very busy life. Lots of a week activies.
sentences.chinese: 你生活很充实啊，有很多的活动。

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他们一定有很强烈的渴望促使他们参加英语角。

sentences.english: However, dependence need not be long term.
sentences.chinese: 然而，依赖并不需要很长时间。

sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位体力活跃，非常好奇以及很好问的男孩。

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易产生注意力问题。

sentences.english: Spitting in the street is considered to be very bad mannered.
sentences.chinese: 拂逆地吐痰，在街上吐痰是很紧张的坏习气。

sentences.english: However, Toni, who knows Ribery well, believes the Bianconeri should sign him.
sentences.chinese: 然而托尼很了解里贝里，并且相信尤文会签下他。

sentences.english: After the meeting, I will you, I very well.
sentences.chinese: 经年相遇，我会对你说，我很好。

sentences.english: Pregame warming-up practice on shooting! It does help.
sentences.chinese: 赛前准备活动投篮练习，是很有帮助的。

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提货单是国际贸易和船运中一种很重要的单据。

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在农业中占很大部分的是种植业和畜牧业。

sentences.english: A visit to one of these places is well worth while.
sentences.chinese: 这些地方的任何一处都是很值得一去的。

definition: very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
straight/erect/to stick out (a part of the body)/to (physically) straighten up/to support/to withstand/outstanding/(coll.) quite/very/classifier for machine guns
